item.title: 捷蓝航空将忠诚计划视为潜在的抵押品来源

item.title: 共和党人称哈里斯为边境沙皇。她到底在移民事务中扮演什么角色？
item.description: 卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）有可能成为民主党提名的美国总统候选人，这促使共和党重新开始攻击她作为拜登政府 "边境沙皇 "的表现。众议院议长迈克-约翰逊称她 "无能"。众议院共和党人投票谴责她 "未能确保 "边境安全，并有六名民主党人加入了这项象征性的决议。【原文：Kamala Harris’ ascent as the likely Democratic nominee for US president spurred a revival of the Republican attack on her performance as the Biden administration’s “border czar.” House Speaker Mike Johnson called her “inept” in that role. House Republicans voted to condemn her “failure to secure” the border and got six Democrats to join the symbolic resolution.】

item.title: 伊朗有了一位改革派总统。他能有所作为吗？

While ultimate power in the country rests with the Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, the president can influence policy by drawing on a base of popular support, political affiliations and links to powerful institutions.
